mapper.select: SELECT u.*,u.username AS preferredUsername, STRING_AGG(r.name, ', ') AS roleList FROM user_entity u JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON urm.user_id = u.id JOIN keycloak_role r ON urm.role_id = r.id where u.realm_id = (SELECT id FROM realm WHERE name = #{realm}) and u.service_account_client_link is null GROUP BY u.id

SELECT ue.id AS user_id, ue.username AS user_name, ue.enabled, r.id AS role_id, r.name AS role_name, r.description AS role_description FROM user_entity ue JOIN user_role_mapping urm ON ue.id = urm.user_id JOIN keycloak_role r ON urm.role_id = r.id WHERE ue.id = #{userId} AND ue.realm_id = (SELECT id FROM realm WHERE name = #{realm}) AND r.client IS NOT NULL
